title: Indian External Affairs Minister goes to LIOC filling station in Colombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankar visited a Lanka IOC filling station in Colombo on Monday (28) morning.
He was briefed by Lanka IOC Managing Director Manoj Gupta on the fuel supply situation, during the visit.
Dr. Jaishankar arrived in Sri Lanka on Sunday (27) ahead of the March 30 BIMSTEC Summit hosted in Colombo.
NO intention of appointing Ranil Wickremesinghe as Prime Minister – SLPP
